alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:30PM CDT until July 03 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... North central Saline County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 329 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wye Mountain, or 11 miles west of Maumelle, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Little Italy... Roland in Pulaski County... Chenal Valley... Wye Mountain... Marche... Palarm... Natural Steps... Ferndale... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
